title: Chicken chasseur with red wine
ingredients: ['oil for cooking', '4 chicken legs', '2 onions, sliced into wedges', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '200g mushrooms, halved', '200ml red wine', '400ml chicken stock', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 tablespoon flour', 'salt and pepper']
